mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fire Protective Mobilization Committee Memorandum Regarding a Meeting About the Fire Protection of Eagle Rook, Dated from March 25, 1941 to March 26, 1941
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 1941 Memo regarding the VA Defense Council and meeting to discuss fire protection for Eagle Rook, as well as an attachment containing a bulletin of suggestions.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
